keepConnect.name: Tena hɔ .
keepConnect.helperText: Sɛ wobɔ Start link no so a, ɛnde fa link no sie. Eyi hwehwɛ sɛ wɔde adwene si so sɛ wɔbɛsan abɔ link no bere nyinaa bere a wɔatwa mu awie no.
keepConnect.retryCount: Nnipa dodow a wɔsan nya nkitahodi .

url.name: URL .
url.helperText: Link URL, sɛ nhwɛso no ws://192.168.0.2:7001, anaa wws://example.com/path .
url.error: URL a ɛfata no yɛ URL a efi ase wɔ ws:// anaa wws:// .

status.waitRetry: Twɛn a wɔretwɛn sɛ wɔbɛsan abɔ mu...
